programme.title: The Big Bang
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: The Big Bang, S04E02, Throughout history, our nightly view of the universe has fueled our collective imagination. When it comes to the Big Bang, not even the most creative work of imagination can rival what science has revealed about the birth of the universe.

programme.title: Water Worlds
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Water Worlds, S03E03, The key ingredient to life in the universe is water. Until recently we thought Earth was the only place in the solar system to have any water at all. Now that probes are peering around nearby worlds we are finding that is just not the case.

programme.title: Fermi Paradox
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Fermi Paradox, S04E05, The Fermi Paradox asks the ultimate question: Given a few reasonable assumptions about the chance of life arising elsewhere in the universe and the distance between the stars, why has an alien civilization not presented itself?

programme.title: Borderland / Mars: Red Dawn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E15, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Landing on Mars
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landing on Mars, S03E06, Mars sparks our curiosity like no other planet because it is so reachable. Despite having landed there, most of the information we gather is still done by instruments in the planet's orbit.

programme.title: Cosmic Rainbow
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Cosmic Rainbow, S02E03, In the world of astronomy, how do we overcome the limits imposed by our own eyesight? The universe comes alive by viewing the cosmos in infrared light to gamma radiation.

Earthrise: The First Lunar Voyage, 20130101080000 +0000, Interviews with Apollo 8 astronauts, their wives, mission control staff, and journalists give true insider's perspective to the space race of the late 1960's.

programme.title: Shore To Shore
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Shore To Shore, S02E04, Our seafaring nature has translated well to the space age, seeking to sail out into the unknown in search of riches of one kind or another.

EARTH´S EVIL TWIN, S05E04, Venus is a planet closest to Earth in distance and size, it once may have been as hospitable to life as Earth is now. Then something changed and Venus became shrouded in hot dense toxic clouds.

RISING TIDES, S05E03, The next generation of Earth observation satellites are now in place maintaining the continuity of long-term climate data, in particular the planets rising temperatures and related ocean levels.

programme.title: The Inner Worlds
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Inner Worlds, S01E03, They orbit between us and our Star, the inner worlds; hidden within the sun's glare often only visible at sunrise or sunset.

STAR LIGHT, STAR BRIGHT, S05E01, The two current science missions to our star; the sun have made great leaps forward in the science of how stars work, how they generate solar winds and how they affect their orbiting planets

programme.title: Juno, Cassini and Beyond
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Juno, Cassini and Beyond, S03E05, The Cassini space craft has completed its mission over Saturn, Juno has reached its target and has commenced its scientific observations of the giant planet Jupiter.

programme.title: Tickets Please
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Tickets Please, S04E03, No spacecraft have traveled so fast or so close to a star before. It is hoped to reveal the source of the solar winds that effect us here on Earth

programme.title: Emissaries
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Emissaries, S02E06, Our solar system is vast, from our own star the Sun to Earth is nearly 150 million kilometers or 1 Astronomical Unit.

programme.title: The Astronauts
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Astronauts, S02E01, One hundred kilometres above the Earth’s surface lies an invisible frontier: the edge of space.

programme.title: Planet X
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Planet X, S04E04, The New Horizons mission continues deeper into space, it’s next target looming close.

programme.title: The Giant Planets: Lords of Gravity / Outer Limits: Edge of the Solar System
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E16, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Night Fire

programme.title: Hubble's Renaissance
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Hubble's Renaissance, S02E01, Before we can reach space, we must first be able to see it. Hundreds of years ago, the simple telescope was used to give us a seemingly closer vantage. Today, we use the awe-inspiring, and super powerful, Hubble Space Telescope.

programme.title: Milky Way
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Milky Way, S04E01, This episode traces our view of the Milky Way, from the mythology of ancient sky watchers to the efforts of scientists to map it from the inside out.

programme.title: Virtual Universe
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Virtual Universe, S02E06, Our understanding of the cosmos is limited by the amount of time we have to see it. Fortunately, computer simulations can help us see how galaxies interact over millions of years, and even how dark matter structures the universe.

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Gravity, S03E04, Gravity has long been a force that has intrigued scientists. Now, for the first time scientists are probing to detect gravity waves in space as well as mapping the gravity patterns of the moon.

programme.title: Rocky Shores / Silent Partner
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E14, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

How to Colonize the Stars, 20090101080000 +0000, Leading physicists and engineers in the field of interstellar travel discuss some of the deep issues we face when considering the problem of sending spacecraft to other stars. Will mankind ever truly become a space fairing civilization?

programme.title: Cosmic Collisions

programme.title: Interface

programme.title: The Sun

programme.title: The Sunday Morning Slasher
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E11, Law enforcement officials fear they may have to release a serial killer from prison until a 24-year-old murder case gives them a chance to lock him up for good.

programme.title: Family Secret/Justice Delayed
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E05, Forty-one years after the crime, a woman implicates her brother and cousin in the murder of a policeman.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E2011, A boy's toy Batmobile car provides an important clue for detectives struggling to make a case against a serial killer who stalks and kills waitresses.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic: Cold Case Files Classics, S02E26, Best of the Year Marathon: Serial Killers

programme.title: The Boy And The Monster/Secret In The Cellar
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E02, In Portland, Maine a housewife disappears. One year later her body is unearthed in the cellar. I.R. unravels this cold case investigation from the inside out. With the help of science, police are able to uncover a blueprint of the crime.

programme.title: The Black Dahlia
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S06E06, Bill Kurtis examines one of the most infamous cold cases in Los Angeles history.

programme.title: The Shopping Cart Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E03, A dry cleaning tag inside a sweatshirt left at a crime scene helps police track down a serial killer and rapist who had been eluding them for years.

programme.title: Blood Money/Precious Doe
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E20, Testimony about the growth of larvae in dead bodies helps convict the man who stabbed a couple to death and strangled their 4-year-old daughter in 1993.

programme.title: Danny Bible/License To Kill
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E21, A Texas woman's murder is finally solved when the killer's plan to kill a second woman and stuff her into a duffel bag goes awry.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E21, A quarter of a century after the murders of two nurses, Canadian police suspect that a former Toronto cop committed the crimes. A blow to the head of a garbage collector in San Jose leaves strange markings.

programme.title: The School Teacher
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E04, When 25-year-old school teacher Christy Mirack is found murdered in her apartment in 1992, there is no shortage of suspects.

programme.title: Love and Hate
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E07, Near what's known as the hanging tree, the mutilated body of Timothy Coggins is found in late 1983. The investigation is thwarted and the case freezes for over 30 years, until a newly elected sheriff vows to bring the killers to justice.

programme.title: Killer on Campus / The Bow Hunter
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E15, Thirty-two years after the killing of University of Michigan law student Jane Mixer, police use DNA found on her pantyhose to finally track down the killer.
MST3K: Quest Of The Delta Knights, 19980926000000 +0000, Pearl sits in on part of this week's experiment as part of her annual review, and Leonardo da Vinci stops by.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: A Date With Your Family
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E19, Learn the many ways you've acted improperly during family dinners in this 1950s short.

MST3K: Racket Girls, 20220927050000 +0000, A gym owner gets into trouble, becoming the target of the mob and the law. The 1950 short presents a high school couple rushing into marriage, and the marriage counselor who talks them out of it.

MST3K: Radar Secret Service, 19931218000000 +0000, Mike and the bots learn the art of safe driving and why you should pay attention at railroad crossings in the 1959 short, Last Clear Chance. Later, they watch government agents use radar technology to catch criminals in Radar Secret Service.
Backlot: MST3K: Santa Versus Satan, S01E33, This episode of Backlot features an interview with some MST3K crew and other experts as they look back at this quirky Rene Cardona-directed movie.

MST3K: Robot Holocaust, 19900113000000 +0000, After the ninth chapter of Radar Men From The Moon (1952) ends in technical difficulties, Joel and the bots must endure Robot Holocaust (1986). They pretend to be characters from the movie, but Tom Servo is the only one who is into it.

MST3K: Robot Monster: MST3K: Robot Monster, 19891223080000 +0000, The guys watch a post-apocalyptic film about aliens and robots, riff on two more installments of "Radar Men from the Moon", and try to understand surrealism.
MST3K: Santa Claus Conquers The Martians, 19911221000000 +0000, Martians abduct Santa Claus and two human children in hopes of bringing Christmas to their planet.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: The Phantom Creeps - Chapter 1: The Menacing Power
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E10, The first installment of the 1939 serial starring Bela Lugosi.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: The Days Of Our Years
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E23, Stay safe with this informative short about occupational hazards.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Out Of This World
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E22, It's Heaven vs. Hell in this short. Plus: bread?

MST3K: Star Force: Fugitive Alien II, 19911116000000 +0000, Ken and the crew of the Bacchus 3 return in Star Force: Fugitive Alien II (1987) while Joel and the Bots make a Captain Joe action figure and stage a "name that puppet" quiz show.
MST3K: Teen-Age Strangler, 19931107000000 +0000, Mike and the 'bots watch the dreary educational short Is This Love? (1957) and the horrifyingly bad Teenage Strangler (1964).

Little John, 20020505000000 +0000, An estranged father's failing health forces a reunion between a judge and the child she gave up for adoption. Stars Ving Rhames, Gloria Reuben, Patty Duke, and Robert Bailey, Jr. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

A Painted House, 20030427000000 +0000, 10-year-old Luke had never kept a secret or told a lie. But when two groups of migrant workers-and two dangerous men-come to work the family's Arkansas cotton farm, mysteries suddenly flood Luke's world.

To Dance with the White Dog, 19931205000000 +0000, An unusual love story in which a strange white dog appears and helps Sam Peek, a Georgia tree farmer, cope with the loss of his wife, Cora. Stars Hume Cronyn and Jessica Tandy. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

After the Glory, 19921129000000 +0000, A group of WWII veterans returning to their small midwestern town , find in the strong-arm tactics of local politicians, the same tyranny they went off to fight against and band together to defeat it at home.

Kiss at Pine Lake, 20120519000000 +0000, Luke Garvey buys his uncle's Camp Pine Lake only to find himself the owner of a sinking business. Zoe McConnell, Luke's girlfriend from years ago, wants him to sell until an old flame is rekindled.
J.L. Family Ranch, 20160101000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. Rancher and former sheriff John Landsburg must save his beloved family ranch.

programme.title: The Truth About Lies
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E05, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie's magic can't keep her away from Abigail's scheming.
How to Train Your Husband, 20180619000000 +0000, A marriage therapist attempts to fix her own marriage by focusing on how to change her husband. Stars Julie Gonzalo, Jonathan Chase.

Harvest of Fire, 19960421000000 +0000, An FBI agent is sent to investigate an arson in a peaceful Amish township, but she must first gain the trust of an Amish widow suspicious of outsiders. Stars Lolita Davidovich and Patty Duke.

Grace & Glorie, 19981213000000 +0000, An emotionally fragile younger woman volunteers to take care of an independent feisty older woman. Stars Gena Rowlands, Diane Lane, Neal McDonough, and Carrie Preston. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

programme.title: Doppelganger
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E04, During an exploratory walk on a jungle planet, Sheppard touches a glowing crystalline growth and becomes host to an infectious energy form. Once on Atlantis, the entity begins to move from person to person, putting the entire crew at risk.

programme.title: Travelers
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E05, On his way back to Atlantis, Lt. Col. Sheppard is taken prisoner by a rogue ship helmed by a ruthless human commander with a secret agenda. As the team searches for him, Sheppard's resourcefulness is put to the test as he tries to stay alive.

programme.title: Tabula Rasa
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E06, With Atlantis plagued by an amnesia-causing virus, McKay wakes up with no idea who he is or what is going on. Following instructions from a video he recorded earlier, McKay frees himself and sets out to find the key to unlocking this mystery.

programme.title: Missing
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E07, Arriving on New Athos for an overnight visit, Teyla and Dr. Keller discover the entire settlement abandoned and their own lives in jeopardy from the Bola Kai, a fierce warrior tribe. The pair must avoid capture until Atlantis sends a search party.

programme.title: The Seer
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E08, With still no trace of the Athosians, Teyla requests an off-world visit to meet with a seer, Davos, who may be able to help her find her people. Meanwhile on Atlantis, Agent Woolsey arrives to observe and review Col. Carter.

programme.title: Common Descent
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E17, Destiny discovers the survivors of an interplanetary expedition who claim their civilization, Novus, was founded two thousand years earlier by Destiny’s crew. Suddenly, they are attacked by the Drones who have discovered a way to track Destiny.

programme.title: Epilogue
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E18, Returning the settlers to their home planet Novus, the Destiny crew discover the planet has been abandoned and is on the verge of seismic destruction. While pouring through an underground archive, the crew learns of the true origins of Novus.

programme.title: Blockade
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E19, When Destiny’s attempt to recharge in a star is foiled by attacking drones, Eli suggests a risky plan to recharge in a super-hot blue giant…a star so hot it could destroy the ship…unless someone stays aboard and keeps the ship under manual control.

programme.title: Gauntlet
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E20, After a battle, Destiny’s only option for survival is a jump to the next galaxy. Crew members return to Earth to say what may be their final farewells before embarking on their journey. But a risky stop may put the entire plan in jeopardy.

programme.title: The Changeling
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E19, Teal'c mysteriously begins to hallucinate and is haunted by visions of an existence where he is a human being. As his paranoia deepens, Teal'c must rely on the help of friend Daniel Jackson to determine where his dreams end...and his reality begins.

programme.title: Memento
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E20, SG-1 accompanies the X-53 on its voyage into deep space. When the ship drops out of hyperspace, SG-1 is stranded with no means of getting back to Earth. Their only option lies in exploring a nearby planet where a Stargate is thought to be located.

programme.title: Prophecy
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E21, SG-1 encounters a civilization desperate to be freed from the clutches of a Goa'uld. While on the planet, Jonas falls ill. His illness is diagnosed as a brain tumor but it gives him the ability to see the future...where SG-1 are walking into a trap!

programme.title: Full Circle
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S06E22, Daniel appears to O'Neill and alerts him that Anubis has located the Eye of Ra, an object of power hidden on Abydos. With Daniel's help, SG-1 find the Eye first. Determined to have it, Anubis threatens to destroy the planet unless they hand it over.

programme.title: Fallen
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E01, As SG-1 begins its search for the Lost City, they discover that Jackson has been returned by the Ancients without any memory of who he was. While SG-1 tries to help him regain his memory, they discover that the Lost City is not on the same planet.

programme.title: Homecoming
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E02, Anubis travels to Kelowna after discovering that it has mines of a more powerful source of energy that he can use to make his new weapon more destructive. The leaders of Kelowna contact SG-1 for their help, but make an ill-advised deal with Anubis.

programme.title: Fragile Balance
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E03, A 15-year-old infiltrates the SGC with the startling news that he is Colonel Jack O'Neill, having mysteriously reverse aged 30 years overnight. Possessing O'Neill's knowledge, exact DNA and, above all, his attitude, can he really be O'Neill?

programme.title: Orpheus
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S07E04, Through the help of Daniel, Teal'c visualizes that Rya'c and Bra'tac are being held prisoner in a Goa'uld death camp. With SG-1's help, Teal'c sets out to rescue his son and his mentor, but can he overcome his fears in time?

programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E010, The chemistry between Brenda and Dylan starts to heat up when Brenda accidentally catches him in the shower, then comforts him after he fights with his father.

programme.title: B.Y.O.B.
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E011, Both Walsh twins face the temptation to drink alcohol when their peers are doing it all around them.

programme.title: One Man and a Baby
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E012, Brandon gets an unexpected taste of fatherhood when he asks his classmate Melissa for a date-then has to baby-sit her infant son while she has a college interview.

programme.title: Slumber Party
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E013, Pillow talk threatens to destroy Brenda's sleep-over as all the girls share their deepest secrets, with unexpected results.

programme.title: East Side Story
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E014, The Walsh's agree to let their maid's niece, Carla, use their address to enroll at West Beverly.

programme.title: Palm Springs Weekend
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E015, A weekend in Palm Springs goes awry when David invites Steve, Kelly and Donna to join him at his grandparents' house while they're away on a cruise-but he gets the dates confused, and they're still there.

programme.title: Fame Is Where You Find It
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E016, Brandon is "discovered" when he's out roller-blading, landing a role as an emergency extra on a big TV show.

programme.title: Stand (Up) and Deliver
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E017, Brenda's had it with home life and West Beverly and decides to leave both for the real world.

programme.title: It's Only a Test
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E018, The Walsh twins and all their friends are panicked by the upcoming SATs, but then everything gets put in perspective when Brenda finds a lump in her breast and faces a test no one can prepare for.

programme.title: April Is the Cruelest Month
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E019, Brandon interviews a classmate, Roger, who's an outstanding athlete and student--and haunted by the overbearing success of his father.

programme.title: Spring Training
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E020, Baseball fever strikes when Brandon is asked to coach a little league team after his dad gets injured.

programme.title: Spring Dance
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S01E021, The drama and the stakes rise as the West Beverly High crew gets ready for their Spring Dance.

programme.title: Beach Blanket Brandon

programme.title: The Party Fish
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S02E002, Brandon sets his eyes on an older Beach Club worker, whose mysterious secrets make her even more appealing to him.

programme.title: Summer Storm
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S02E003, Dylan, injured in a surfing incident, stays with the Walshes during his recovery - until Jim Walsh kicks him out for kissing Brenda!

programme.title: Anaconda
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S02E004, After an illegal late-night poker game, Brandon and Dylan clash over a break-in at the beach club.

programme.title: Play It Again, David
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S02E005, Kelly is mortified when her mother starts dating David's father and plots to break up the new couple.

programme.title: Slush Puppy/Kapiolani Hospital
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E339, A Golden Retriever is caught in a freezing river current. A 9-year-old boy is injured when the all-terrain vehicle he's riding flips over.

programme.title: Furnace Fire/Logger’s Lament
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E229, A man and his children are severely burned when their water heater explodes. A lumberjack is pinned down by a huge falling log.

programme.title: Victorville Bank/Paramedic Delivery
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E380, Four armed men rob a bank and lead police on a high-speed chase. A paramedic delivers his own baby en route to the hospital.

programme.title: Lansing Stabbing/Santa Delivery

programme.title: Sail Away
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E17, Stephanie is recruiting lifeguards for the annual Sailing Regatta where they will compete against South Bay, and Neely is taking the competition very seriously. Meanwhile, Mitch finds out Joey has grandparents who want to care for her.

programme.title: Lost and Found
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E18, Mitch and Caroline rescue a woman who gets amnesia falling off the pier and must find her father to help her recover her memories. CJ meets a wheelchair-bound man who’s determined to get wheelchair access across the beach to the water.

programme.title: Forbidden Paradise, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E19, The team is invited to Hawaii for a week to oversee new lifeguard techniques and relax a bit. Logan becomes obsessed with competing in a surfing competition. To avoid a curse, CJ and Stephanie must return a sacred lava rock to its original location.

programme.title: Forbidden Paradise, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E20, After Matt is stung by a poisonous fish, he and Mitch find a village where a young woman offers to help them, resulting in all three of them running from her jealous suitor. Logan’s selfish behavior puts his relationship with Caroline in jeopardy.

programme.title: Last Wave
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E21, Kaye is reunited with old flame Wes Masters. Stephanie undergoes surgery for melanoma performed by her doctor and boyfriend Tom, who plans a romantic surprise for her when surgery is over. Caroline catches Logan cheating on her with Neely.

programme.title: Go for the Gold
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E22, While in search of underwater treasure, things take a deadly turn when Stephanie and Cody are confronted by a pair of drug smugglers. Back at headquarters, Newman faces off against a different type of treasure hunter…

programme.title: Shark Fever
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E01, Logan decides to write and direct a low-budget action flick at the beach using a drugged shark as the villain, but things get out of hand when the shark Is not properly sedated!

programme.title: The Contest
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E02, When Mitch Judges the Miss Malibu Beach Bikini Contest, his willpower is tested by two competitors who will do anything to get his vote. Later, Cody designs the "Windjet,” an innovative, new lifesaving boat/waverunner combination.

programme.title: Liquid Assets
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E03, CJ befriends Max, a homeless eccentric who claims that he was once a famous Hollywood Costume designer. When Max dies suddenly, CJ learns he was rich and has left her $4 million in his will. Manny joins junior lifeguards.

programme.title: Windswept
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E04, At the annual Baywatch Lifeguard Bachelor Auction, Mitch is "bought" for $5,000 by a wealthy socialite. The relationship gets complicated when they get stranded on an island and their social status is reversed. Cody joins a local roller hockey team.

programme.title: Scorcher
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E05, LA is in the throes of a severe heat wave! Hundreds of thousands of people head to the beach. Lifeguarding gets more chaotic for the team when the Secret Service shows up to inform them that the President is going to go jogging on the beach.

programme.title: Beachblast
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E06, To sponsor the Special Olympics at the beach, Mitch hires MTV DJ Jenny McCarthy to throw "Beachblast:" a live televised tournament. After being evicted from his apartment, Cody moves in with CJ and Caroline, creating a surplus of sexual tension.

programme.title: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E07, CJ's mother, a former Las Vegas showgirl, arrives in town seeking CJ's help to get away from her mobster ex-boyfriend. When CJ and her mom are held hostage on a remote beach, it is up to Mitch and Cody to rescue them.

programme.title: Let the Games Begin
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E08, Australia's Uncle Toby's International Ironman Competition comes to LA. The Baywatch girls think all is fair in sports and convince the guys that they should compete as equals, setting the stage for a series of pranks between the men and women.

programme.title: Buried
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E09, Controversy generated by Donna's appearance in Playboy magazine divides the Baywatch lifeguards. When an earthquake triggers a rockslide, burying a bus full of junior lifeguards, Mitch, Samantha, Cody and Donna try to rescue them.

programme.title: Search and Rescue
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E10, After rescuing a group of fishermen and tourists from a pier fire, Samantha and L.A. fire chief Captain Huntingdon form an elite joint Search and Rescue unit. Meanwhile, Cody asks CJ to paint his portrait, and Mitch receives some strange PI work.

programme.title: Heal the Bay
programme.desc: Baywatch, S07E11, Donna and Caroline work with Heal the Bay after a recent rainstorm washes inland pollutants into the waters off Santa Monica. Mitch falls ill after he unknowing swims over sunken drums of toxic chemicals.
